weekly_top_story.headline: US Withdraws from UN Bodies and International Organizations
weekly_top_story.summary: The Trump Administration announced sweeping withdrawals from dozens of UN bodies and international organizations, undermining multilateral institutions and targeting programs focused on climate, trade, gender, and development.

stories.headline: UN Urges Iran to End Protest Violence and Restore Internet Access
stories.summary: A UN-mandated human rights fact-finding mission has called on Iranian authorities to immediately restore internet access and halt violent crackdowns on ongoing nationwide protests.

stories.headline: Sudan War Leaves Millions Hungry and Displaced as Health System Nears Collapse
stories.summary: The ongoing conflict in Sudan continues to devastate civilian populations with severe humanitarian consequences including mass displacement, food insecurity, and deteriorating health infrastructure.
